plot: On April 26, 1986 at 01:23 AM Chernobyl's power reactor no. 4 exploded and exposed radioactivity on hundreds of thousands Ukraine citizens. Now, 15 years later this documentary looks back ...
title: Punktering af en myte - 15 år efter Tjernobyl
